content.detailedDescription:
While recently viewing a street level map section of moonstone beach dr. in cambria ca. the google map vehicle appears to have captured an unknown object just above the tree tops. the object appears gray in color and round in shape. the google picture is not able to adequately define the shape of the two (2) frames of the object, but it is flying at a low altitude in an apparent n/e direction. the most visible picture is when the object is approximately 500 feet above the treeline that is west of moonstone beach dr.The second frame shows the object going out towards the sea.

to see the object, go to google maps(street view)address of 6991 moonstone beach dr. cambria, ca. find the driveway entrance from moonstone beach dr. to the san simeon state park "leffingwell landing". you will see cars parked at the entrance of the road.Go to the very end of the state park road until google can no longer go any further and then turn the view around so as to face back in the direction of moonstone beach dr. the object will be visible above the treeline. to see the second captured frame of the object you must place the cursor at the bottom of the picture and click it one (1) time to move the view only the minimal distance of travel towards moonstone beach dr. the object will no longer be in frame above the treeline because it is traveling in an apparent n/e direction. however, pan the view to the left looking back towards the ocean and you will see the object going out over the ocean.  these are the only 2 pictures caught by the google vehicle. 

i am hoping you can digitally enhance the pictures to determine what the object is.

thanks and good luck!
content.summary: Gray in color and round in design

content.detailedDescription:
Had just arrived at our lake house on the kississimmee chain in central fl. close to 5pm from my yard i saw 3 bright lights that appeared to be directed downward ( not in my eyes) and made no sound what so ever. i called to my wife who ran out and saw these 3 lights move slowly into a small cloud, and it never came out from the cloud. i estimated at that time at the rate it went into the cloud (i actually counted)  from 10-15 seconds that object should of come out from behind this small cloud. the ufo  had 3 lights that were in a triangular fashion under it and was not really able to see an object. being in law enforcement at the time my first thought was a helicopter, but made no sounds. the lights where extremely light and pointed straight downward and they were in a triangular shape. i saw no flare from the light source. 

the entire episode was maybe 2 mins at the maximum. after the lights entered the small cloud, i stood that kept watch for at least 5 minutes or more. 
i made a phone call to my nephew who was in nc, or n. ga. the next day to tell him and he advised me he had seen an exact description about that same time the day before. it was some period of time ( days) that i also heard and saw a report on tv of it being seen from as far south as naples, fl.

i know many years have gone by, but decided to report it after speaking with a mufon member recently.  btw, i have almost seen exact footage of what i reported on tv and a family who had filmed if not the exact at least a very close similarity and close to a body of water . sorry for the decades of delay for filing such a report. 

thank you,
content.summary: Ufo had 3 triangular lights under object, moving slower sw direction. at my distance noted the lights where larger than a basketball. a single small cloud was in the path of ufo in which the ufo travelled and did not exit cloud !

content.detailedDescription:
Traveling south from route 322 7pm as passenger.  some clouds out, this was not in the clouds.  glowing white ball of some size in distance, not moving.
i had close to a minute to observe it, it did not move.  there was a plane
the next time i could view the area (tall cornstalks blocked view as we moved) further in the distance.  ball was closer to south end of hershey,
plane was most likely taking off from hia.  nothing to see, no movement,
no real way to judge its size except the plant that came later.  could have
been half the size of the plane.  it was almost full dayight, just starting to lose a little light, around 7 pm.
content.summary: Solid white

content.detailedDescription: I awoke at 2 am because i may have seen a brief flash of light in my room. i got up and looked out my window and observed a craft on the ground that looked like a lead demeanor and it was approximately 10 ft in diameter with a small bubble on top. i thought i was dreaming and went back to bed. i could sense i was not alone in my room and awoke to three approximately three 4 ft beings grey in color. i was petrified however i was told i would be fine and we won't hurt you and then felt calm and i believe they had oral and vaginal sex with me and it was fabulous. and very shortlived. i was exhausted at work the next day and my body felt as if i had an entire not of sex. it seemed about three to four months later after original experience i was revisited. without any physical trauma they removed a child from my stomach and said she would be their queen and they were escstatic. they assured me she would be well taken care of and i would see her again some day. i never intended to speak of this however my boyfriend spoke of seeing an object in the sky and i told him of this event and he insisted i share this. however i work for a prominent individual and i'm afraid i could lose my job but i assure you all that i have told you is the absolute truth.
content.summary: At 2 am noticed craft in my yard approximately 10 feet in diameter.  had contact with aliens in my house

content.detailedDescription: On approx date above i worked until midnight in tucson was at 12th and valencia driving north on 12th at 1 am 1/4mi n of valencia. as i was driving it was quiet only one 1 other car passed opposite direction still driving all of a sudden a bright almost blinding light was over my car and it followed my car i had window down no radio on there was not a sound and being from military family i am very aware of things and even to this day my last physical my hearing disbelieves physicians. so as i moved along approx 35mph it kept following the erie thing was no sound and anyone knows a helicopter even mile way can hear blades. so i paniced and pulled into a a&w pulled under canopy they were closed pitch black not even a dog barking. i sat few minutes i thought i cop helicopter then they would be checking why i am sitting under cover but nothing bright light stayed staionary for 2-3 minutes then as fast as it appeared went off i waited less than a minute slowly backed out with lights off looked up saw nothing but stars no shape off anything. freaked out i drove home. next morning i called tucson international airport no reports but there had been 2 other enquiries. i had told my mom next morning she never disbelieved me as she totally believes we are being visited. my dad being military man air force 33 years everyone knows pilots see unexplained things. i told many peolple my experience over the years and finally looked up mufon and decided to comment. to this day when ithink off the episode my hair on head and arms still stand on end. the other night had been thinking about it upset me i had tears with hair standing.
content.summary: Light no sound

content.detailedDescription: I just need to know if anybody reported seeing a ufo over what appeared to be south phoenix south mountain on the evening of september 1st 2014 if anybody else did i would gladly report what i thought in details.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: I just please just need to know if anybody reported a ufo on september 1st 2014 in az

content.detailedDescription:
Since 1986 i have became aware of unusual lights that appeared every night at dusk until around 9:30 pm in my area, and other parts of orange county.

in around 1995 an investigation of these lights were done my mufon of orange county and me for 2 nights.  the objects observed went into mufon's records as 'unknown' that years later jan harzan (now director of mufon) told me 'unknown' means ufo.

it is now 2014, and i still see those lights with eyewitnesses.

they are the size of an aspirin, and blink and flash.  years ago they appeared in all directions coming in at 2 at a time about every 20 seconds.  recently i observed them for around 40 minutes, so i do not know, at this time, how long they appear.  one's sighted time is usually around one minute.  they appear and disappear seemingly from nowhere.  sometimes one or two nearby each other take on the size of a basketball.  they are reddish, and appear less than a hundred feet high.  for the past couple of years, at least, i seen them only in one area over a main street.

observing the lights from ihop restaurant i was sitting on a planter with a 2 foot square window behind me.  as i was observing one or two of the lights i started hearing loud knocking on the window 2 feet away from me.  i assumed it was one of my friends who worked there, so i put up my hand and wiggled my fingers.  but when the knocking kept up i turned around, and saw nobody there.  as i was looking at the window the knocking continued. and it continued for about a full minute after i looked straight back at the lights.  the knocking on the window sounded like it was coming from the inside of the restaurant.

over the years i have been trying to figure out what those lights were, as i photographed and filmed them.  now i presume they are nuclear powered propulsion systems that accompany invisible spacecraft with invisible occupants.  thank you.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Ufos over orange county

content.detailedDescription: I was part if a team that uncovered and transported a star-gate. that is the only way to describe it. my unit found it by accident close to mosul. we were rebuilding a road called atlanta that connected to msr tampa . with a d-7 dozer in a farmers field. we thought it was a bomb at first but eod cleared it. special forces guys came and had us dig the structure up which was shinny metal with writing that looked like what i think is egyptian. but i would call them check marks that were bunch together. we transported it to fob diamond back and that was the last i saw it.
content.summary: I was in the army as a equipment operator and i helped dig up and transport a stargate is the only way i can describe it.

content.detailedDescription:
My son and i had gone mountain biking up to the metwell trail in kingman. he went home and i decided to go back out. i was standing on the summit not far from the old downtown. i was looking out over the downtown area when i saw a brilliant white light in the sky, exactly like the pictures i have seen. it was coming from the east, kinda floating. my first thought was to pull out my camera but i just had to focus on it and didn't feel the need to video it. at first i thought it might be a mylar balloon, but then it came down real close. it was a brilliant white aura and all i could see were some slight dark vertical lines within the aura. the only thing i could think to relate it to would be like the shape of a hockey puck. it was so close and so brilliant it was hard to make out anything but the light,the lines were the only thing i could see to give it any kind of shape. it came in from the east almost floating like a feather, except the wind was from the south. it then started heading north along the ridge, i started to follow it then thought, " i can't chase this thing" so i stopped.I put my hands down to my side, and thought,"what? i'm here, talk to me". i showed no fear or aggression. then it was as if it stopped to look at me. i saw and felt this web of energy come from it. it looked like lines of electrical energy connected together to form a web, like the lay lines of the earth. it felt like some kind of scanner, like it was collecting information. i actually felt a connection to it. when it left i saw a small zig-zag then i saw a small flash of orange and it was gone in a split second.                 
    
   i also saw a ufo up in meadview a few years ago. it moved exactly as bob lazar described it, and i was only a short ufo distance from area 51.So i have done some research and do believe what i saw and felt was very real and the most amazing thing i have ever seen.
content.summary: First a glowing sphere, then it came towards me, changed, and emitted some kind of energy field.

content.detailedDescription: We were driving north on m52 when we spotted a strange cloud like shape in the sky. when i saw it, i decided it looked far too odd and thick to be a jet chem trail; it also wasn't trailing very far behind the object but instead seemed to surround the object creating it. today an asteroid was supposed to come close to earth and we therefore pulled safely over near jerusalem road to pull out our binoculars. when i first examined the formation through my binoculars, it was immediately apparent that there were three distinct, thick vapor trails. it struck me as extremely odd; it looked like a "hand" was coming out of the sky with three dull, sphere like objects at the head of each trail. they were slightly staggered. i could actually see vapors rolling off of these objects; there was a pretty distinct aura around each. we were debating if it could be jets in the beginning, however an air liner passed over the formation during the sighting; the air liner was closer in our field of vision; the jet liner was dwarfed in comparison to this formation. i distinctly remember feeling nauseous when first viewing the formation through the binoculars as it looked incredibly foreign; the objects were moving at incredible speed in an eastward direction. we lost sight of the object as it was rapidly moving east and eventually became too blurry to view through the binoculars.
content.summary: Saw strange vapor formation in sky; used binoculars to examine. 3 sphere like objects observed with vapors radiating off.

content.detailedDescription: Approx 10 pm one night went out front of house for smoke on driveway facing north looking at stars then compelled to turn south and look further up found myself fixed on a particular star looked normal but in my mind i just knew somehow i was supposed to look at it . it then after about a minute started to pulsate and move down slowly then stop and then pulsate quicker for a couple of minutes .I felt an incredable calm watching it , then at a extreme rate it zig zaged up slightly east of origanall position then motionless for a short time , then took off to the east and vanished.Its not the first time.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: some sort of esp and visuall to my benefit of understanding

1.Take photos
2.Nothing - i was amazing

5.When drew photography did not see anything just the track of plane
6. this case has no answer this question
content.summary: I take a photo a plane and after i see the objet
content.locationName: Viana do Castelo, Viana do Castelo District

content.detailedDescription:
After a day in the dc area and suburbs, i was heading home on pennsylvania avenue which becomes maryland's hwy 4. which is where i was when my daughter, who is 10 years old and quite bright, and i noticed the object straight in front of us but off to the left a bit.  i at first thought it was a plane, as this is very close to andrews afb, but as we got closer, it had an odd almost triangular shape with some sort of rounded compartment at top center.  we are quite used to the planes buzzing everywhere, what struck us about this object was that it was just sitting there in the air above the trees.  we saw no exhaust or fumes or propellers.  i have no idea how this object was actually flying.  we continued to observe it as we drove toward it on a straight portion of the road until finally we passed it and could no longer see it.  the whole 15 minutes or so that we observed the object, it never moved, made a sound, flashed a light, nothing.  it just hung there in space looking very odd and out of place.  there were no markings, flags, symbols or insignia of any kind painted onto the exterior of the craft, it was just covered in a dark smoky gray paint. that's all we recall at this time.

the experience was disturbing enough to bring me here and to try to see if anyone else reported the object we saw.  i've never seen anything close to a ufo before, and maybe i still haven't, but after a lifetime lived on military bases with planes flying almost constantly, i can honestly say i've never seen anything like that before.  the only thing close to that hovering capability would be a helicopter, and this was in no way a helicopter.  as i said before, there were no rotors visible, no propellers, no propulsion device visible at all.  it just left both my daughter and me with a very odd feeling and a question we couldn't answer, which is something we hate!! lol!
content.summary: Odd shaped and colored flying object that hovered until it left sight.

content.detailedDescription:
Also in february 2 of these silent orange globes at packard/platt both traveled across the sky disappeared into the sky within 30 seconds
 tonight i seen 1 hovering the same kind of orange ball similar color to the hps street light, i clearly seen it change to a red color then back to orange it ejected or shot something like a shooting star stream straight down then it started ascending southeast toward ypsi it got real small then it made a final flash and then gone beyond the naked eye
 i live under the airport landing path for 30yrs uofm med flight is regular as well as jets and planes the blimp etc.. but this was nothing like public/military aircraft it was silent in the night sky i dont even know that this was solid nothing you could grab onto they're more like a ball of light something organic in appearance definitely not metal
content.summary: Orange ball in the sky

content.detailedDescription: I pulled into a parking lot and observed what i thought at first was an odd colored aircraft and then another and finally five orbs in a varied line from the north of nansen summit headed southeast transecting an actual airplane flight path but below and to the west of the airplane.  they were led by a "classic" saucer type vehicle, but from my perspective i could not tell whether it was an orb or a saucer shape.  it was also unlit and illuminated by the rather large and bright moon this evening against the clouds that were above it. the orange/red orbs followed it to the se and continued over pcc campus towards i5 and tigard when i lost sight of them.
content.summary: 6 orange/red glowing orbs being led by a cylindrical grey orb or saucer type vehicle.

content.detailedDescription:
It was approximately 11:50pm.  i was taking my dog out for the last time before going to bed. i noticed a bright glowing orb in the northwestern sky.  at first, i thought it might be a lantern, but it seemed to move exceedingly fast, faster than even a plane or jet would appear to move across the sky, yet it made no sound. i was amazed to see how fast it moved.  i had never seen anything like it before. its glow pulsated or flickered, but randomly, not like aircraft lights.  this may have been related to the atmosphere, as the stars were flickering in the same manner.  it was difficult to estimate its size or altitude.  i could see its shape plainly, so it seemed closer than aircraft fly, but it may have been a larger object farther away. i watched it pass behind the neighbor's house.  i moved to the backyard and saw it again on the same path traveling from north to south. it did not deviate from its course. it did not speed up or slow down. there was a faint white glow around the orb. i went inside to tell my wife to look out our southern facing window, but it had disappeared. it had covered the distance in a matter of about 1 minute. i was explaining what had happened to my wife when she said that she saw something out the window too.  this was about 5 minutes after i sighted the first object. when i looked, i could see the same or a second, similar object.  it had the same appearance and was traveling on the same path, but it appeared to either be smaller or further away.  i grabbed binoculars, but it was far away and i couldn't make out any more details.  it passed behind a tree and flickered more before fading out.  at the end, it appeared to fall toward the ground and flicker out. it was visualized for about 45 seconds.   the temperature was 64 degrees, skies were clear, winds were light out of the north. the moon was a nearly full in the southern sky. 

i know this was not a meteor because it was too slow and steady. it did not appear to be a traditional aircraft because of its shape and speed and lack of standard lights and sound. my best guess is that it could be a lantern, because of its glow and lack of noise and the appearance that it may have burned out at the end.  however, it was moving very fast.  i wouldn't think a lantern could move that fast unless the upper level winds were much faster than those at the surface.
content.summary: Orange-red glowing orb sighted over fishers.  it traveled across the sky much faster than an aircraft, yet made no noise

content.detailedDescription: Saw a light moving across the sky. no faa lights. completely silent. did not appear to be a chinese lantern, have seen these before and it was not a lantern.
content.summary: Bright white orb/ light. silent. not an airplane or lantern.

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
I was walking home from a late dinner and i happened to look up at the sky just as i was about to arrive home. i observed 4 large, apparently low-flying, pulsating, glowing red orbs with orange highlights flying in formation. they were traveling from e to w at a fairly slow pace. i observed them/followed them down the street for about 1 1/2 to 2 minutes before they simply vanished like they either turned off or simply blinked out of existence.

three of the orbs formed a perfect triangle while the 4th was trailing slightly behind the "rear lh" corner of the triangle. the distances between the 3 points of the triangles were equidistant while the "straggler" was closer (about half the distance between the others). they made no noise.

i am an amateur astronomer who lives near an airport so i see all manner of planes, satellites, etc. i have never seen anything like this and cannot even begin to explain what it was. if i was observing a solid craft with lights (although there was no indication that it was such) it must have been massive. a city block wide and at least twice as long.

not more than a minute after the orbs simply vanished right before my eyes, a small commercial plane flew by just to the south of the orb's flight path but in a w to e direction. whatever these orbs were would have been just head of and to the left of the cockpit and i find it impossible that the crew of that flight would not have gotten a better view of whatever this was that i saw.

please feel free to contact me if you have any followup questions or there is any missing/unclear information in my report.

i thank you for your time and apologize for any typos.
[name, phone number, and email removed/cms/tg]
content.summary: 4 glowing red orbs. 3 in the shape of a triangle, 1 following closely behind. observed for 2 minutes before they vanished.

content.detailedDescription: It was late evening and i was enjoying a bonfire with my girlfriend. i was staring at the stars almost straight up in the northwestern sky. suddenly a small light appeared in the sky a bit bigger than a star. the light grew about 3 times bigger kind of in a diamond shape then shot straight up into space. the whole event took about three seconds. i was amazed at the speed and brightness of the object. then about 10 or 12 seconds later i saw the same thing happen again very close to where the first one appeared. the event reminded me very much like what a spaceship in "star trek" looks like when they go to warp speed. i continued watching the stars for awhile but nothing more happened. my girlfriend was not looking up at the sky and missed it. i got up and went to my truck to check the time and it was 11:33 local time.
content.summary: I was watching stars when i saw a light appear out of nowhere. it became very bright and was like a diamond shape. then it became very small and vanished into space. it took a total of 3 sec. then i saw it happen again about 15 sec. later

content.detailedDescription: Saw the exact same red light.. in the same spot 2 hours later again. thinking this is a drone with an led as it moved over the same half mile or so path and hovered in the exact same spots and disappeared in the exact same manner. somebody in oakdale must have a new toy... maybe : )
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Same light again

content.detailedDescription: Outback in mira mesa, taking the dog out, then there's this blue object in sky and it turned quicker and sharper than any other plane or helicopter i've seen. it came towards my house, it was about 2-4 houses away, north of me, and then i saw all blue, red, and white lights. there was a helicopter in the sky south of me and they are loud. we thought it was a flying droid thing like amazon has been talking about but when we ran to front of house to see it better, it disappeared within seconds and never came back.
content.summary: Round quiet quick smooth fast turning object with red blue and white lights then disappears into sky heading north

content.detailedDescription:
Was outside on the driveway at close to 10pm in kennesaw ga. as amateur astronomer i habitually look up to check the visible constellations and noticed the red box-like pattern traveling from the northeast from beta cassiopeia  going southwest. the waxing gibbous moon provided ample night vision. few clouds obscured the sky. no other flying objects visible. no contrail visible. no sound heard. the lights seemed to brighten and dim irregularly. the lights did not blink like anti collision lights. none of the lights blinked at all. in both the box-like pattern and triangular pattern there were red lights. there were no green lights or white lights.

my initial thought was an aircraft traversing toward atlanta ap or mccollum field. but there was no anti-collision light pattern and then all lights went dark when it was straight overhead. i waited a few moments for it to reappear. it did not reappear. 

from my aspect, the speed at which the object traveled exceeded 300 kts/hr. i thought maybe it was a bolide, but the local news made no mention of local sightings and there was no visible fireball trail. i then thought maybe it was that comet that's suppose to pass by this weekend, but my readings indicate that object is too small for the naked eye.

if it was an airplane i would have heard something and saw the anti-collison lights. it sure wasn't a meteor.
content.summary: 3 lights, sometimes 4 lights in tirangular or box like pattern very slowly moving. no noise. then objectwent black. near full moon with widely scattered clouds. waited to reappear, but didn't

content.detailedDescription: Wife and i witnessed a single red orb with white pulsating lights. white lights appeared to revolve around the red light. the object looked the same color as the 12 or so red orbs that i witnessed last november. i was hesitant to pay further attention as i saw white lights pulsing to a slow rhythm. i assumed passenger jet at first. i continued to watch because the object appeared stationary. the rhythm of white lights increased sort of randomly and over the course of about five minutes the rhythm had increased to a constant glitter. the object stopped for about two minutes and hovered over the oakdale area (again). it was heading slowly towards the wnw until it disappeared over the horizon. i took a video. haven't checked it. likely too far and too dim but i'll post back if interesting apart from the commentary : )
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Red orb flashing lights

content.detailedDescription:
Got a storm warning on my weather radio so i took my dog out to do his thing at 8:30ish.

happened to look up and saw what looked like a comet moving across the sky.  my first thought was of a flying torch that the orange light is steady, but has a kind of pulsating flicker like a flame.

a distance behind this came another.  it was pretty far back but eventually i was able to see both simultaneously in my view.  it followed the same path.

went inside and told my wife i'd just seen 2 ufos and she should come and see as i believed we might still be able to see them in the distance due to their bright lights.

we go out the side entrance next to the driveway and low and behold another was passing by and seemed closer.  then as we stood there a procession of 8 more flew by all spaced at the same interval all on the same path.

i ran in and got my phone and took a few quick videos. i didn't get much because the light on my phone was bright and i didn't want to draw attention to us. about 2-3 mins later after the last one a jet flew by following their general flight path/direction.
content.summary: Procession of ufos

content.detailedDescription:
My wife and i where exiting our car in our driveway when i noticed in my peripheral vision 2 black objects very high in the sky at about 5 o'clock high traveling what appeared to be slow at first but at that distance speed was hard to determine. at first i thought they were eagles, but eagles here tend to circle one another when traveling, these were in line but separated one slightly higher and to what appeared more easterly than the other. it appeared they went into a right banking maneuver turning more easterly and climbing that is when i observed them from a bottom on position. the shapes appeared diamond like with 4 distinct corners. they came out of the bank and i was able to see edge on but at a greater distance now. they appeared to have some bulk to their shape at that time. they eventually climbed out at approximately a 1 o'clock position and we lost sight of them. just to the north and east of our location a storm edge was forming. these objects appeared to be maneuvering away the leading edge of the storm. the duration of this sighting was approximately 15 min just at dusk with grey skies. i was excited to see this. i was formerly in the air force and trained to id aircraft shapes. these were of no known aircraft that i have ever seen.
thank you for your consideration.
content.summary: Observered slowly moving south to south east very high noisless 1st seen bottom on then as it turned east from side

content.detailedDescription:
I first saw a ufo in chicago, really close by my bedroom window, it was even slanted appeared to be observing me through my window. my cousin was there with me and she saw it too. when we ran to the front door to go outside a bright bluish white light lighted up the whole house and it was gone. this happend like around 2000-2004 cant recall exact date. no one believed us. it was a disc as big a a regular bedroom and it was slanted over my neighbors roof but really close to my window, directly at my window and it was just hovering there turning slowly, had round windows red and green, red and green all around.

then after that i kept seeing weird white lights in my bedroom and sometimes i would hear someone calling me and no one would be home just me.

then when i moved to san antonio i still kept seeing white orbs here and there in my new home with my parents.

then i moved to poteet last year.
i stoped seeing the orbs.
but on july 4rth of this year i was outside alone inside my mini van listening to music. my cat tagged along and was inside with me. i had my windows down and i turned the light on from the inside of the van. i was taking pictures of my cat whom was acting silly. then all of a sudden my phone froze and i wasn't able to scroll through it, then it blacked out, and i thought the battery had run down but then it turned back on on its own and i saw that it still had enough battery so i thought that was strange. i also had a strange feeling like if someone was watching me but i felt brave because my cat was with me so i didn't feel completely alone.
it marked 3:13 am on my van's clock but on my cell phone it marked 3:15am when i decided to keep taking pictures of my cat right after my phone had turned back on... so i took like 3 pictures of my cat repeatedly to try to capture a good pic of him. 
when all of a sudden i noticed something on one of the pictures... it looked like a face but i didn't want to freak my self out so i didn't even stare at it for long i just turned off my car and went inside.
i felt scared, i felt like something was watching me.

then... friday aug 29th around 3 am i can't quite remember how things happend that night.
i don't know if i had a dream or if it was real because it felt real
any who this is what i dreamed or so i think i dreamed.
i heard a noise and i went to my kids room and checked them out then i went outside and circled around my trailer home. 
when i was infront of my trailer home i noticed that there was something in the sky and it was approaching me. it was a round black ball, no lights... i freaked out and as i turned around to run inside all of a sudden i felt a light carry me off my feet. i was trying to move to try to get out of that light and i couldn't, i kept feeling like it was taking me up. it was like a reddish bluish kinda transparent streaks of light but i couldn't see that well through it... then after that i can't remember a thing except remembering waking up on my sons bed with a grey alien ontop of me. i wasn't scared, i felt anger and i manged to get my arms out of his restrain and i quickly tried to slap him, i don't know if i hit him but he was able to restrain me again and he gaved me a look, an emotionless look and that's all i can remember after that, his face, his round black eyes and his little nose and mouth... it was scary 
then that whole weekend i couldn't stop thinking of his face and his eyes and the light... until i remembered the picture!! i had erased it from my phone but i remember that they automaticly get saved in google so i went to my google and there it was, the same face i saw was also in that picture!!
im freaking out because now i think this has probably been happening to me since little and it just now hit me.
content.summary: Later on,  08/29/2014 friday around 3 am i dreamed of an alien abduction and i saw the alien.

content.detailedDescription: Rounded object on sky with lights on off at all time change direction too fast see the video facebook group magic valley ufo
content.summary: Have video magic valley ufo facebook

content.detailedDescription:
Today at 1:08 pm i saw the first ufo. i was looking in the north and saw a small point of light appear and begin to move south, it had a reddish tint at first until it got closer to the middle of the sky. it flashed randomly as if reflecting the sun, there was a short white line that came out and moved in and out around the object. i watched it as it got more distant and faint, eventually i stopped watching it. i saw two more which were similar, except one of them seemed higher so i didn't see the line coming out of it. then i saw a fourth one, by this time i had gotten my telescope. its not a very good one but i was able to see the shape of the object very well. at first it looked like a crecent, but then i realized the crescent shape was wings and there was a small dot on the bottom that resembled a tail, there was no head but there was an outline of what looked like a body. the object didn't move like a bird, it wasn't going in the right direction for the position of the wings, it was traveling very slowly across the sky and it was spiraling slowly, but its wings didn't flap at all, it was spiraling like a leaf in the wind or like a plane spinning on its side. it neither looked like a plane or a bird though as it was so high up i needed a telescope to see it properly. all the sightings took place between 1:08 pm and roughly 1:30 pm. if someone gets back to be via email i will send a drawing outline of what i saw. i haven't had time to scan a drawing yet because i really wanted to report it first but if someone can reply to be about this i can send a picture. i tried taking a picture of it with my camera but it didn't come out.

i also recorded the event with a voice recorder but that isn't any different from what i have written here.
content.summary: Shimmering objects moved slowly across the sky

content.detailedDescription: Hi all, yesterday at around 1840 i observed a cigar like craft traveling about 500 ft above the hospital i work at. it appeared to be the size of a commerical airplane possibly a bit larger, however the video i have is very breif and requires frame by frame viewing on a computer, but the object is detiled and clear using these methods. after viewing the video i "think" that when viewing frame by frame you can see other circlular grey in color shapes moving about. the video is breif due to the fact that i was driving at the time. i have more footage of different shaped craft as well but this is the first time ever speaking publicly about these sightings, i would just like to get more information as to what is going on in our skies. i would appreciate any thoughts into what i have sent. thank you for your time in advance.
content.summary: Cigar shaped craft, in a striaght line like direction.

content.detailedDescription: Storm hit us and there was nothing to do power was out. listening to my mp3 player, just looking outside just saw a plane fly by then 5 mins. later i saw this bright oval soild light.Over the tree tops close where i live. i knew it was not a plane i know what planes look like and the lights too.. it hovered for a second and then it moved side to side real quick and then it was gone. i have seen ufo's before so im not as shocked anymore.. i was at awe thou because i have not seen one in a couple years around where im at.
content.summary: Bright ufo over tree tops
